Message:
My body began sinking
to the bottom of the lake.

In this world, the kindest people
are the first to be sacrificed.

That’s why I wanted to make
a world where that kind girl
would never have to cry...

But, despite my best intentions,
I only ever left her in tears...

Through my fading vision,
I spotted Nebra.

I couldn’t even lift a finger,
but as soon as Nebra’s pained
expression entered my sight,
my body mysteriously
regained its strength.

Pulling her to me,
I breathed all of my
remaining oxygen into her...
as though giving her
my life itself...
